original_text: Yet the Lord was not willing to destroy the house of David, because of the covenant that he had made with David, and since he had promised to give a lamp to him and to his sons forever.
korean_text: 여호와께서 다윗의 집을 멸하기를 즐겨하지 아니하셨음은 이전에 다윗과 더불어 언약을 세우시고 또 다윗과 그의 자손에게 항상 등불을 주겠다고 말씀하셨음이더라

sentences.original_text: Yet the Lord was not willing to destroy the house of David
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주님께서는 다윗의 집을 멸망시키기를 원하지 않으셨다

sentences.original_text: because of the covenant that he had made with David
and since he had promised to give a lamp to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 등불을 주겠다고 약속하셨기 때문이다
그리고 그의 아들들에게도 영원히 주시기로 했기 때문이다
